title: DIH Rollback on failure doesn't revert last_index_time in dataimport.properties
description: I'm sure I saw this. Due to SOLR-2804, my import got rolled back, but the last_index_time was not reverted, so when I ran my import again, I lost a bunch of records that would have been imported in the failed run.

comments.author: Anshum Gupta
comments.content:
Is this issue still open? It's been almost 3 years and multiple releases.

P.S: I'm not digging deep but just cleaning out a critical/blocker JIRAs for 5.0 tracking.
